SEARCH
Package com.github.jpmsilva.jsystemd

Class SystemdSpringApplicationRunListener

java.lang.Object
com.github.jpmsilva.jsystemd.SystemdSpringApplicationRunListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpringApplicationRunListener
public class SystemdSpringApplicationRunListener extends Object implements SpringApplicationRunListener
A Spring Application Run Listener that sets up a SystemdApplicationRunStatusProvider to provide status updates of the current phase of the application life cycle.
Author:
Joao Silva
